channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Event Manager -- WP User Profile Avatar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Event Manager -- WP User Profile Avatar

item.title: CVE-2023-52118|2024-06-27T19:34:59.102Z -- wp%20event%20manager -- wp%20user%20profile%20avatar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Event Manager WP User Profile Avatar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP User Profile Avatar: from n/a through 1.0.
